name: Przeklęci Łacińczycy
description:
Oh them Przeklęci Łacińczycy... They stay on the dark side of the moon and try to control our lives... They've thrown me into an inactive volcano and launched eruption sequence with mysterious Hydria Oleum Secum. Luckily I have hp regen, dash and double jump abilities. I have to escape.

Controls:
WASD - move
Mouse - look
Space - jump and double jump
Shift - dash

Credits:
Created and designed by Zwalczacze Przeklętych Łacińczyków Team
Emilia Pachulska - Art
Dominik 'vos' Zgutka - Programming & Level Design
Maciej 'Vador' Sidorczuk - Programming
Krzysztof 'dalton' Pachulski - Additional programming & VFX
